column4: sorry folks... I am very new with linux and ubuntu.. I am afraid I do not understand what you suggest. "bum (source: bum): graphical runlevel editor. In component universe, is optional. Version 2.5.2-1 (precise), package size 83 kB, installed size 520 kB"
open a terminal and type: sudo apt-get install bum
-- I have tried all the sugestions in that url but the darn drums still beating... :-)
